title: Bug 4329: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), the expected behavior is to display search results. However, currently, no results are found. It is observed that searching via context menu in the packages view works as expected. The search should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, display the element name rather than the fully qualified name.
